info.title: dockerql - Schema
info.description: A read-only SQL-like interface for docker registries. The table schema.

name.description: The name of the registry as defined in the $DOCKER_REGISTRIES_FILE.

type.description: The registry type. Currently dockerhub or gcr.

namespace.description: The default namespace to be used for queries against this registry. Namespaces have different meaning for each type of registry. For Dockerhub namespaces are mapped to Organizations. While for GCR namespaces are mapped to Hostname, such as us.gcr.io.

registry.description: The name of the registry as defined in the $DOCKER_REGISTRIES_FILE.

namespace.description: The namespace for the repo. Namespaces have different meaning for each type of registry. For Dockerhub namespaces are mapped to Organizations. While for GCR namespaces are mapped to Hostname, such as us.gcr.io.

isPrivate.description: Is this repo private?. Dockerhub only.

updated.description: Last updated date of the repo in simplified extended ISO format (ISO 8601). Dockerhub only.

registry.description: The name of the registry as defined in the $DOCKER_REGISTRIES_FILE.

namespace.description: The namespace for the repo. Namespaces have different meaning for each type of registry. For Dockerhub namespaces are mapped to Organizations. While for GCR namespaces are mapped to Hostname, such as us.gcr.io.

tag.description: Tag name if one was assigned to the image.

size.description: Size in bytes of the image.

created.description: Creation date of the image in simplified extended ISO format (ISO 8601).

pushed.description: Last datetime the image was pushed in simplified extended ISO format (ISO 8601).

pulled.description: Last datetime the image was pulled. Dockerhub only.
